alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 11:18PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONT WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE HIGHWAYS... .Snow has changed to rain near Haines, but has remained snow out the road and near the boarder. For Skagway, cold air and light winds have allowed for precipitation to remain snow near sea level. Wet and heavy snow is expected to continue for Skagway overnight with highest totals towards White Pass. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan, including the Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult and is discouraged unless it is an emergency. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It is possible that Skagway could warm overnight and change to rain which will limit additional accumulations near sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
